// http://www.spoj.com/problems/ACPC10A/

#include<iostream>
using namespace std ;

int main()
{ int t ;

long long int a=1 , b =1 , c  =1 ;
cin>> t;

  while( t--)
  { cin>> a >> b >> c ;

    if(a==0 && b==0 && c==0) break;
    else  if( b-a == c-b)
    { cout<<"AP " ;
      cout<< c + b-a  << endl ;
      }

   else if(b/a ==  c/b) {cout<<"GP " ;
       cout<< c*(b/a)<< endl ;}





  }







return 0 ;}
